In regards supply of koudougu for kantei. There should be a large 
supply o=
f items published eg. in the Token Bijutsu, that if 
permission obtained ha=
s all the leg work done and relatively good 
opinions. This would also be a=
 valuable resource, given a few years, 
that could be archived and availabl=
e to download for private 
individuals. A conscious effort could be made to=
 eventually include 
examples from all schools. Right now it is memory work=
 and 
inconvenient to look through back issues. A thought. 
John           =
